go_data.justification: IR25a acts as a coreceptor in combinations of up to three subunits for individual odor-specific receptors in insect chemosensation.
IR25a is involved in insect chemosensation as part of the variant ionotropic glutamate receptors.
IR25a is expressed in many, if not all mature OSNs of various species, including Drosophila melanogaster.
